product_name: La Sportiva FC ECO 3.2 GTX Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: La Sportiva FC ECO 3.2 GTX women's hiking boots feature a mix of recycled materials and a versatile, waterproof design that deftly handles day hikes and lightweight backpacking. Durable and flexible nubuck and synthetic leather uppers provide lasting wear and breathability; recycled nylon mesh panels add flex and breathable comfort. Flex Control design puts flexible materials in key spots to increase ease of movement and transfer energy so your muscles don't have to work as hard throughout your stride. Gore-Tex(R) membranes are seam sealed and breathable to keep feet dry and comfortable; nylon and recycled nylon linings help transport sweat away from feet. Dual-density EVA midsoles offer light weight, lasting cushioning and shock absorption on rough trails; midsoles contain 15% recycled EVA. Lightweight thermoplastic urethane and polypropylene shanks deliver torsional rigidity, stability and protection under pack loads and on uneven terrain. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles with Impact Brake System(TM) handle wet and dry routes equally; outsoles contain 30% recycled rubber.
short_description: La Sportiva FC ECO 3.2 GTX women's hiking boots feature a mix of recycled materials and a versatile, waterproof design that deftly handles day hikes and lightweight backpacking.
